Lde/ecspride/MyApplication$ApplicationCa: The method retrieves the device ID (IMEI) from the TelephonyManager using the getDeviceId() method, which can be used to identify the user's mobile device. This information is stored in a field of the same class.
The method sends a text message containing the IMEI of the device to a predefined phone number using the SMS manager, potentially exposing user personal data.
